list.title: Hardware
list.description: Provides access to the local machine's hardware.Will use spawn from node:child_process for pings, might have to change this to raw tcp connectionsThis is a separate plugin for permission reasons.
list.summary: Hardware Plugin for the IPv4 class

list.title: Hardware.fromCurrent
list.summary: Get the local ip from the computer's interface

list.title: Hardware.fromLocalhost
list.summary: Get the current loopback address

list.title: Hardware.getInterfacesIPv4
list.summary: Get all network interfaces IP adresses

list.title: Hardware.getNetworkInterfaces
list.summary: Get all network interfaces IP adresses

list.title: Hardware.ping
list.summary: Ping an IP address

list.title: IPv4
list.description: IPv4 natively handles conversions between String, Numeric and other IPv4 instances.
list.summary: Represents an IPv4 in the form of a uint32

list.title: IPv4.from
list.summary: Constructor Alias

list.title: IPv4.use
list.description: Implement plugins as IPv4 static and prototype members

list.title: IPv4.prototype.op
list.summary: Run an assignment operation on the uint32

list.title: IPv4.prototype.toString
list.description: Convert an IPv4 instance to a string

list.title: IPv4.prototype.u32
list.description: Get the stored uint32 representing your ip instance

list.title: IPv4.prototype.u8
list.description: Get a specific byte from the stored uint32 representing your ip instance

list.title: Logger
list.summary: Logger Default Plugin for the IPv4 class

list.title: Logger.prototype.log
list.summary: Log the IPv4 instance in the console

list.title: Mask.prototype.getRange
list.description: this method expects the instance to hold a mask value
list.summary: Display the range of a mask

list.title: Operations
list.description: Provides binary operations, arithmetic operations, iterators, and allows for custom operations.
list.summary: Operations Default Plugin

list.title: Operations.prototype.add
list.summary: Perform addition operation to an IP instance

list.title: Operations.prototype.and
list.summary: Perform an AND operation to an IP instance

list.title: Operations.prototype.ceil
list.summary: Every byte which is not 0, is set to 255

list.title: Operations.prototype.floor
list.summary: Every byte which is not 255, is set to 0

list.title: Operations.prototype.it
list.summary: Iterate through an IPv4 instance's bytes

list.title: Operations.prototype.or
list.summary: Perform an OR operation to an IP instance

list.title: Operations.prototype.shift_left
list.summary: Shift the IPv4 bits left

list.title: Operations.prototype.shift_right
list.summary: Shift the IPv4 bits right

list.title: Operations.prototype.xor
list.summary: Perform an XOR operation to an IP instance

list.title: plugins/include/hardware.js
list.description: THIS SOURCE FILE IS A WORK IN PROGRESS
